value.description: A cybernetica-band signal amplifier sanctified with binharic protocols. Control nodes must be tuned to a specific overseer. This will add 1 bandwidth to that overseer's total bandwidth, allowing them to control more cybernetica constructs.\n\nOnce a control node is constructed, it can be quickly tuned to an overseer through sacred rites. However, retuning a control node to a different overseer takes significantly longer, as the machine-spirit must be appeased and the binharic frequencies realigned.

A cybernetica-band signaling device sanctified with forbidden binharic rites. When activated, it emits a powerful cybernetica signal pulse encoded with ancient protocols, which will attract an ultra-heavy feral Necron construct to attack with its escorts. If you can defeat it, you can collect special technologies from its corpse. The signal pulse burns out the transmitter's machine-spirit, so this building can only be used once.

A cybernetica-band signaling device more powerful than the normal cybernetica signal antenna, enhanced with advanced binharic protocols. When activated, it emits an ultra-powerful cybernetica signal pulse encoded with forbidden rites, which will attract a Necron commander to attack with its escorts. If you can defeat it, you can collect special technologies from its corpse. The signal pulse burns out the dish's machine-spirit, so this building can only be used once.

A short-range ship used by an overseer to transport cybernetica constructs for low-orbit or planetary travel. The vessel's machine-spirit has been damaged in the crash, but its core systems remain functional.

A remote energy and computation enhancement device sanctified with binharic protocols. Any friendly cybernetica constructs in its effect radius will move and work faster, their machine-spirits invigorated by the beacon's sacred frequencies.
This cybernetica construct's capacities have been boosted by a nearby cybernetica enhancement beacon, its machine-spirit invigorated by sacred binharic frequencies.
